body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of J. Bailey and P. Bailey. Married to Eliza Bailey. Father of Jenny A. Bailey, James Bailey, William Bailey, John Bailey, Mary W. Bailey, Sarah W. Bailey, Docia F. Bailey, Lawrence Bailey, Chelly J. Bailey, Henry C. Bailey, and Virginia Bailey. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860.
